pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Downscaling using the Dissever Algorithm // Spatial downscaling of coarse grid mapping to fine grid mapping using predictive covariates and a model fitted using the 'caret' package. The original dissever algorithm was published by Malone et al. (2012) doi:10.1016/j.cageo.2011.08.021, and extended by Roudier et al. (2017) doi:10.1016/j.compag.2017.08.021.
